item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Quick WITCHER S1 #spoiler-free-review:

  • great season, but what a tease
  • I like Henry Cavill in this role more than as Superman
  • although he plays the titular Witcher, the season’s plot largely involves Ciri and Yennefer’s origins as well - I wish I had watched this before playing the Witcher games, it’s the great backstory recap I never had
  • looking forward to S2!
